title: البَدَل
description: Learn about البدل (substitution/apposition), one of the التوابع (followers), including its four types: بدل كل من كل، بدل بعض من كل، بدل اشتمال، and بدل غلط.

notes.title: What is البدل?
content: البدل is one of the التوابع (followers). It is a word that replaces or further specifies the word before it (المبدل منه).
Unlike عطف البيان which only clarifies, البدل can stand in place of the original word. The intent is actually on البدل, not المبدل منه.
keyPoints: البدل follows المبدل منه in case (إعراب)
The meaning focuses on البدل, not المبدل منه
Often the first word prepares for the second
Part of the four التوابع: النعت، التوكيد، العطف، البدل

examples.english: I saw Zaid, your brother (complete substitution)
I ate the loaf, a third of it (partial)

notes.title: Complete Substitution (بدل كل من كل)
notes.titleArabic: بدل كل من كل - البدل المطابق
content: بدل كل من كل (also called البدل المطابق) is when البدل equals المبدل منه completely in meaning.
The second word is identical to or synonymous with the first: جَاءَ عُمَرُ الْفَارُوقُ (Umar, Al-Farooq, came).
keyPoints: البدل = المبدل منه in full meaning
Often proper nouns, titles, or descriptions

examples.english: I saw Abu Bakr, the truthful
I visited the city of Damascus

notes.title: Partial and Inclusion Substitution
notes.titleArabic: بدل بعض من كل وبدل اشتمال
content: بدل بعض من كل is when البدل is a part of المبدل منه: أَكَلْتُ التُّفَّاحَةَ نِصْفَهَا (I ate the apple, half of it).
بدل اشتمال is when البدل is something contained within or associated with المبدل منه: أَحْبَبْتُ زَيْدًا أَخْلَاقَهُ (I loved Zaid, his manners).
keyPoints: بدل بعض من كل: part of a whole - requires pronoun suffix
Examples: نِصْفَهُ، ثُلُثَهُ، رُبْعَهُ (half, third, quarter)
بدل اشتمال: abstract quality or associated attribute
Examples: عِلْمَهُ، أَخْلَاقَهُ، كَلَامَهُ (knowledge, manners, speech)

examples.english: I read the book, half of it
I drank the water, some of it
The student impressed me, his intelligence
I heard the singer, his voice

notes.title: Correction Substitution (بدل غلط)
content: بدل غلط (or بدل الإضراب) is when the speaker corrects a mistake. The first word was an error, and the second is the correction.
This is less common in formal writing but occurs in speech: رَأَيْتُ رَجُلًا امْرَأَةً (I saw a man - a woman).
keyPoints: The speaker said the first word by mistake
Also called بدل الإضراب (turning away from)

examples.english: I went to the mosque - (I mean) the market

exercises.promptEn: I read the book, _____ of it (partial substitution)

exercises.prompt: I ate the apple, half of it
I heard the singer, his voice
